mapper.select: SELECT permissiondetail.target FROM permission, permissiondetail, permissionuser WHERE permission.id = permissiondetail.permission_id AND permission.id = permissionuser.permission_id AND permissiondetail.func = '200' AND permissionuser.user_id = #{userId} AND permission.deleted = false AND permissiondetail.deleted = false AND permissionuser.deleted = false GROUP BY permissiondetail.target

SELECT permission.id , permission.deleted , permission.created_at as createdAt , permission.modified_at as modifiedAt , permission.title , permission.content FROM permission WHERE permission.id = ${id}

SELECT permission.id FROM permission
ORDER BY permission.id permission.title ASC DESC Limit #{offset}, #{perpage}
